name: New Life: Re
description:
This is a story about a boy who is trying to help his sick bedridden mother for a new better life, for a highschool boy a surgical operation cost is too high, and he see that recycling is one of the way to collect money. Will he be able to help his mother? Or will he fail? Find out in the game!

February 05, 2020

February 07, 2020

Main Menu UI Added.
Main Menu Function Added.

June 04, 2020

Character Sprite Changed (v.0.2).
Function Codes Fixed (v.0.2).
